nodes.text: The Rori Stadium was a sports arena on the moon Rori, in the Naboo system. During the Galactic Civil War, Nuna-ball was among the sports venues arranged there.

The Rori Stadium was first mentioned in the Champions of the Force set of the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game. "Rori Stadium" can be translated from Aurebesh text on the "Nuna-Ball Advertisement" card.
